alert.note: Alert for San Juan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 2:42AM PST until January 16 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Juan County zone. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While weaker than yesterday, low pressure offshore will enhance tidal anomalies up to a foot above predicted anomalies. This could lead to minor tidal overflow across the San Juan Islands. High tides look to decrease, though remain close to advisory levels Tuesday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
